notesStmt.note: Many of the extant leaves are more or less mutilated. Lacunae after folios: 8, 27, 67, 78, 84, 85, 87, 88, 89, 90, 96, 97, 105, 111, 132, 140. Stained. Several folios damaged, with signs of book-worming. Lacunae after folios: 148, 155, 156, 225, 233, 234, 238, 269, 288, 294, 296, 298, 301. Many folios damaged and/or stained.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Two fragments of Japhet ben Ali Arabic commentaries, on Jeremiah and Ezekiel, respectively.
